1: <pb/><t>¡Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a Jehová! <pb/>Til wal sja'l sb'itnax b'it 'a qui Diosalec. Smoj wal sb'itnax yet' jun tzo'n̈ b'it caw wach'.</t>
2: <t>A xb'on pax chan̈ Jerusalén jun 'ejm xo, xya'n qui yamc qui b'a an̈ israel on̈c tic, atn an̈ sactzicnac cajc can 'at 'a jun tzo'n̈ xo lugar.</t>
3: <t>A tz'a'n sniwnal sc'ojl eb' to 'icha lajwnac spixn tzyab'i, a tz'an̈tn slajwelal eb' cha.</t>
4: <t>A 'ojtnac jantc sb'isl c'anal, a tz'a'n 'och pax sb'i jun jun.</t>
5: <t>Caw niwn yel'ch Cajlilec, caw wal 'ay spoder, may slajb' sjelnal snab'en.</t>
6: <t>A tz'i'n chan̈ eb' 'anma 'emmquilal yeq'ui, a pax tz'i'n can 'ejm eb' maysch'olnil snab'en.</t>
7: <pb/><t>Qui b'itnoquec Jehová yic tzca'nec yuj diosal 'a 'a, qui b'itnoquec b'it 'a qui Diosalec yet' arpa.</t>
8: <pb/><t>A tz'a'n 'och 'asn 'a satcha'an̈, yic tzya'n n̈ab' 'a yib'n̈ lum lum tic. A tz'a'n pac' te c'ultc 'a eb' lum tzalctac.</t>
9: <t>A tz'a'n tas tzc'ux no noc', tzya'n pax tas tzc'ux e no cotc joj yic tz'el yaw e no'.</t>
10: <t>A 'a Jehová may yel'ch yip no chej mto yip junc 'anma 'a 'a, yic tzcoln sb'a 'a junc owal,</t>
11: <t>palta 'a eb' yiclum tzyutj sb'a 'a 'a, eb' tzya'ch sc'ojl 'a schamc'ojlal yic tzcoln 'el eb', caw 'ay yel'ch eb' 'a 'a.</t>
12: <pb/><t>Ex 'aj Jerusalén, b'itn coyc 'a Jehová. Ex 'aj Sión calc wach' paxti 'a qui Diosalec.</t>
13: <t>Yujto a x'a'n 'och yip yijl spuertail qui chon̈b'ec, xya'n pax syaxilal 'a yib'n̈ eb' cunnalec 'a yol qui chon̈b'ec tic.</t>
14: <t>A tz'a'n junc'ojlal a qui lugar 'aj 'ayn̈ec, tzya'n qui wa 'ixm trigo caw wach'.</t>
15: <t>Xya'n alxoc spaxti 'a sat lum lum tic, caw yajn̈ej x'el'ch jun tzo'n̈ spaxti cha.</t>
16: <t>A tz'a'n cot sacb'acm 'icha wal yilx sac lana, a tzma'n puc q'uen che'ew, 'icha xoj stan̈il c'ac' tz'ajcni.</t>
17: <t>A tz'a'n cot q'uen chew sacb'atil, ax sical q'ue'en, toc 'ay mach tztechj yu'uj.</t>
18: <t>A tz'a'n 'ulb'xoc q'uen chew cha, tzya'n cot 'ic' sec tzb'ey a a cha.</t>
19: <t>An̈ israel on̈c tic, yin̈tl on̈c can Jacob, 'ix yac' qui Diosalec cojcoquec 'el spaxti', sley yet' schecnb'il.</t>
20: <t>Man̈ 'ichcta 'ix yutj jun tzo'n̈ xo nacion̈, yuj cha, man̈ yojcoc eb' jun tzo'n̈ sley cha. <pb/>¡Alx cab' wach' paxti 'a Jehová!</t>
